name: bookay
description: NOTE: this package.json is just an entrypoint for tests and deployment. For development, check subfolders.

scripts.build: npm --prefix server install && npm --prefix webapp install && npm --prefix webapp run build
scripts.pretest: npm run build && npm --prefix test install
scripts.test: npm --prefix webapp test && npm --prefix server test && npm --prefix test test
